# Load Data In
```{python}
import requests
import pandas as pd

# Download the data
# Asked Copilot: How to download a csv with Python?
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rudeboybert/fivethirtyeight/refs/heads/master/data-raw/college-majors/recent-grads.csv'
response = requests.get(url)

# Save to local file
with open("../data/recent-grads.csv", "wb") as f:
    f.write(response.content)

recent_grads = pd.read_csv("../data/recent-grads.csv")
recent_grads.head()
```
